ComicInfo.Summary:
The Guardians' secret plan to fight evil everywhere seems to be working.
The Guardians double their forces by adding several international heroes, but the villains of the Order begin their own series of global attacks. New Guardian Cast Iron is gravely injured while protecting the drunken El Chupacabra.
ComicInfo.Writer: Benito J. Cereno,Robert Kirkman,Chris Giarrusso,Benito Cereno,Chris Giarrusso,Robert Kirkman,Benito Cereno
ComicInfo.Title: Part 4
